title: Ground News - 'My country failed me': Eduardo Polonsky, cattle farmer who survived Hamas attacks - La Opinion
text:
Summary by La Opinion Argentinian Jew, who has refused to leave Kibbutz Or HaNer, relives the day of the attacks, and expresses his feelings about the delay in receiving help after the tragedy Share menu More
